main event: The observer saw a large white object in the western sky that had 3 smaller white objects revolving around it. The main object seemed to appear and disappear from view.
interesting points: The main object was 50 feet long and 6 feet wide, with two 'little men' or creatures that were the size of midgets.
The phenomenon was completely silent and moved rapidly, taking off at a high speed and disappearing over the horizon in just a few seconds.
The observer's watch light went out while the object was nearby.
A distinct puff of smoke shot out from the object before it took off.
The object was estimated to be about 4 feet in diameter when at its closest point.
sighted object: a large white object with 3 smaller white objects revolving around it
witnesses: one observer, a retired school teacher
